short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to help you nail your next remote job

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wished you could filter all job boards with searches that would be closer to your needs.
Well here is an extension that just does that.

You can filter
- only US jobs
- only Europe jobs
- only Asia jobs
- closed jobs

on those 2 websites

- https://remoteok.io
- https://weworkremotely.com

Enjoy

Download it on Firefox here https://addons.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/addon/jobboard-master/
